name: Cool Phrases Trivia Game | English | 5 Questions

questions.correct: Burst of energy from object or idea
questions.explanation:
Burst of energy from object or idea.

	The word 'kathexis' implies 'holding' and is from the classical Greek 'katéchein' meaning to hold fast or occupy (kata- + echein = to have, hold).

questions.correct: Everyone is an architect of their future
questions.explanation:
Everyone is an architect of their future.

	I think this phrase suggests that every human controls his or her own fate by the decisions that s/he makes.  You can decide the veracity of this statement.  Thanks for playing the quiz!
